titleStmt.title: Astrologo-mastix, or A discovery of the vanity and iniquity of judiciall astrology, or Divining by the starres the successe, or miscarriage of humane affaires. / By John Geree Master of Arts, and preacher of the word at St. Albanes. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Geree, John, 1601?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, for John Bartlet, at the Guilt-Cup at Austines-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
